name: Limitless (20246)
description:
wasd to move

left click to shoot

top left is your health and energy bar(for gun)

every one minute you get a random buff and random debuff and a boss spawns

50% chance the enemy drops a chest

when you collect a chest you get a random chance to get 1 -4 extra damage per bullet

there is a 2% chance for chests to drop the extra bullet buff

good luck!
